net.sf.jclec.algorithm.niching

Class Sharing

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.sf.jclec.algorithm.AbstractAlgorithm
      • net.sf.jclec.algorithm.PopulationAlgorithm
        • net.sf.jclec.algorithm.classic.SG
          • net.sf.jclec.algorithm.niching.SpatialNiching
            • net.sf.jclec.algorithm.niching.Sharing
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, IAlgorithm, IConfigure, IPopulation, ISystem, JCLEC, IRandGenFactory

    public class Sharing
extends SpatialNiching
    Fitness sharing algorithm. NOTE: This algorithm assumes that the optimal points to search are maximum points.
    Author:
    Sebastian Ventura, Amelia Zafra
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • configure

        public void configure(org.apache.commons.configuration.Configuration configuration)
        Configuration method. Configuration parameters for BaseAlgorithm class are:
        • species: ISpecies (complex)

          Individual species
        • evaluator: IEvaluator (complex)

          Individuals evaluator
        • population-size: int

          Population size
        • max-of-generations: int

          Maximum number of generations
        • provider: IProvider (complex)

          Individuals provider
        • parents-selector: ISelector (complex)
        • recombinator: (complex)
          • recombinator.decorated: IRecombinator (complex)

            Recombination operator
          • recombinator.recombination-prob double

            Recombination probability
        • mutator: (complex)
          • mutator.decorated: IMutator (complex)

            Mutation operator
          • mutator.mutation-prob double

            Mutation probability
        Configuration parameters for this algorithm are:
        Specified by:
        configure in interface IConfigure
        Overrides:
        configure in class SpatialNiching
        Parameters:
        configuration - Configuration settings
